name: Maw of Malmortius
tooltip:
Maw of Malmortius

Cost: 3100
+50 Attack Damage
+50 Magic Resistance
+15 Ability Haste

UNIQUE Passive - Lifeline: If you would take magic damage that would reduce maximum health below 30%, you first gain a shield that absorbs 200 (+ 20% maximum health) magic damage for 5 seconds (60 second cooldown).
